data.quote: The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, doing the best it can….that’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
data.author: Roy Mustang

data.quote: Knowing you’re different is only the beginning. If you accept these differences you’ll be able to get past them and grow even closer
data.author: Miss Kobayashi

data.quote: Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see the end of this world, and to see why it was born. Live to see why a weak girl like me ended up here… And the reason you and I met.
data.author: Sachi

data.quote: We each need to find our own inspiration. Sometimes, it is not easy.
data.author: Kiky’s Delivery Service.

data.quote: Giving up is what kills people.
data.author: Hellsing

data.quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.”
data.author: One Piece

data.quote: How can you move forward when you keep regretting the past?
data.author: Fullmetal Alchemist

data.quote: It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot
data.author: Reiko Mikami

data.quote: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
data.author: Kenshin Himura

data.quote: The ticket to the future is always open.
data.author: Vash The Stampede

data.quote: If your life can change once, your life can change again.
data.author: Sanae

data.quote: Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.
data.author: Rider
